recipesJson.name: Rin's Ice Cream Cone
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description: Prepackaged Ice Cream cone with vanilla ice cream, caramel drizzle and peanuts.

reviews.text: So, all I can really tell you is don’t double the ingredients in this recipe, because I didn’t make this as written. Normally I do mix Rin’s recipes as written and usually I do find them plenty flavorful. This one, I looked at 2% LB Vanilla Ice Cream and was like no freaking way is that enough ice cream, and I immediately just doubled everything. Now I think that was a huge mistake. The peanut and ice cream parts are nice, but I’m searching for the caramel and cone and mostly finding some kind of weird smoked vanilla instead.
This looks good. Gonna give this a go! Ty for sharing
